endpoints.description: Retrieve a detailed report of carbon emissions for the specified production and supply chain processes.
Submit new carbon emission data for a specific operation or time period.
Retrieve the set of emission factors used for calculations in specific contexts and industries.
Add or update emission factors for specific operational activities.
Check the compliance status of reported emissions against environmental regulations.
Submit detailed supply chain data to integrate into the emissions reporting process.
Fetch a list of applicable environmental guidelines and standards for the organization's activities.
Recommend opportunities for reducing carbon emissions based on the provided data.
Retrieve historical audit reports for compliance and reporting purposes.
Remove a previously submitted supply chain data entry from the system.
